医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
APOE4 基因与早发性阿尔茨海默氏症相关，是治疗干预的目标发表在 Nature Medicine 上的一项研究描述了 APOE4 纯合性如何从 55 岁起显着加速阿尔茨海默病的病理学和生物标志物，表明该疾病的独特形式和靶向治疗的潜在焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/APOE4-gene-linked-to-early-onset-Alzheimers-target-for-therapeutic-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/APOE4-gene-linked-to-early-onset-Alzheimers-target-for-therapeutic-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84f734e8-907c-428f-b4b4-97fd396ee7b8 Wed, 08 May 2024 01:20:00 -0400 APOE4 gene linked to early onset Alzheimer's, target for therapeutic intervention
橄榄油——每天7克可以预防痴呆症！ 《JAMA Network Open》发表的一项大规模研究表明，每天食用 7 克或更多橄榄油可以将美国成年人与痴呆症相关的死亡率降低 28%，强调了饮食习惯在控制与年龄相关的认知能力下降方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Olive-oil-e28093-7-grams-per-day-may-keep-the-dementia-away!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Olive-oil-e28093-7-grams-per-day-may-keep-the-dementia-away!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=741b4f69-702e-4318-8bd8-d2bd86d5399a Wed, 08 May 2024 00:49:00 -0400 Olive oil – 7 grams per day may keep the dementia away!
研究表明奶牛的乳腺中同时含有人类和禽流感受体研究调查了牛呼吸道、大脑和乳腺组织中甲型流感病毒（IAV）受体的表达，揭示了人和鸭受体在乳腺中的显着定位以及鸡呼吸道中的主要受体，这可能会影响甲型流感病毒的传播和发病机制。牛的 IAV。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Study-shows-cows-harbor-both- human-and-avian-flu-receptors-in-their-mammary-glands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Study-shows-cows-harbor-both- human-and-avian-flu-receptors-in-their-mammary-glands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db7630eb-74c4-4560-b8f2-ff1ab9454c85 Wed, 08 May 2024 00:29:00 -0400 Study shows cows harbor both human and avian flu receptors in their mammary glands
新的四方纳米笼疫苗显示出对抗冠状病毒变种的希望研究人员开发了一种新型疫苗接种方法，使用四重纳米笼，该纳米笼展示来自不同 sarbecovirus 的受体结合域 (RBD)，显示出增强的免疫反应和针对包括 SARS-CoV-2 及其变种在内的多种冠状病毒株的潜在保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-Quartet-nanocage-vaccine-shows-promise-against-coronavirus-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-Quartet-nanocage-vaccine-shows-promise-against-coronavirus-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9489501-60ca-417a-add1-cd9c7728fd77 Wed, 08 May 2024 00:06:00 -0400 New Quartet nanocage vaccine shows promise against coronavirus variants
密歇根大学倡议解决老年人手部健康差异研究人员知道，精细运动技能会随着年龄的增长而下降，但尽管许多日常任务是用手完成的——穿衣、打扮、服药——但关于老年人手部健康的研究却很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/University-of-Michigan-initiative-addresses-hand-health-disparities-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/University-of-Michigan-initiative-addresses-hand-health-disparities-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb17d61e-c0b2-4ac2-8bca-0db308cfe3a6 Tue, 07 May 2024 23:56:42 -0400 University of Michigan initiative addresses hand health disparities in older adults
华盛顿大学扩大圣路易斯县性传播感染检测和治疗服务为了改善圣路易斯地区的性健康并减少健康差距，华盛顿大学传染病医生正在扩大圣路易斯县北部的性传播感染检测和治疗服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Washington-University-expands-STI-testing-and-treatment-services-in-St-Louis-County.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Washington-University-expands-STI-testing-and-treatment-services-in-St-Louis-County.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7803ba07-0d5c-4701-bb9a-d20fcc177cae Tue, 07 May 2024 23:51:06 -0400 Washington University expands STI testing and treatment services in St. Louis County
分析揭示了罗德岛州非法药物供应中的假药成分一项新的分析揭示了罗德岛州非法药物供应中流通的假药中经常含有芬太尼和甲苯噻嗪等潜在致命物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Analysis-reveals-composition-of-counterfeit-pills-in-Rhode-Islands-illicit-drug-supply.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Analysis-reveals-composition-of-counterfeit-pills-in-Rhode-Islands-illicit-drug-supply.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2eb9b5bd-b65a-4de7-9966-5eef60a3f91d Tue, 07 May 2024 23:46:15 -0400 Analysis reveals composition of counterfeit pills in Rhode Island's illicit drug supply
新研究调查充足的睡眠是否有助于预防骨质疏松症作为 4 月 23 日举行的科罗拉多大学医学系年度研究日的一部分，教员 Christine Swanson（医学博士、MCR）介绍了她由美国国立卫生研究院资助的关于充足睡眠是否有助于预防骨质疏松症的临床研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/New-research-investigates-whether-adequate-sleep-can-help-prevent-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/New-research-investigates-whether-adequate-sleep-can-help-prevent-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d2d8387-b894-43b5-8d55-0b0a0e7fae72 Tue, 07 May 2024 23:40:30 -0400 New research investigates whether adequate sleep can help prevent osteoporosis
用于识别血管修复细胞的蛋白质标记物揭晓研究人员发现了一种蛋白质标记物，可以帮助识别血管受损患者体内能够重新增殖的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Protein-marker-unveiled-for-identifying-blood-vessel-repair-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Protein-marker-unveiled-for-identifying-blood-vessel-repair-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb7e1a88-f9cb-491d-9686-dbe557e02f81 Tue, 07 May 2024 23:15:17 -0400 Protein marker unveiled for identifying blood vessel repair cells
人工智能驱动的模型识别出有效的抗癌免疫细胞，用于个性化免疫治疗路德维希癌症研究中心的科学家利用人工智能开发了一种强大的预测模型，用于识别用于癌症免疫疗法的最有效的癌症杀伤免疫细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/AI-driven-model-identizes-pot-cancer-killing-immune-cells-for-personalized-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/AI-driven-model-identizes-pot-cancer-killing-immune-cells-for-personalized-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8dd72d0-f365-4e23-b70e-077f52be8d3b Tue, 07 May 2024 22:46:30 -0400 AI-driven model identifies potent cancer-killing immune cells for personalized immunotherapy
